turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I was wondering if you could help me order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what did you want to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four small pizzas. Two of them meat lovers. One of them just chicken, and the other just onions and chicken. And all of them need to thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the order for 4 small pizzas with thick crust, 2 meat lovers, 1 chicken, and 1 onions and chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order. it'll b ready for pick up in 35 mins. did you need anything else?
